title: the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 (No. 11 of 2016) (except insofar as it
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 

(Section 31) (Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited paternity leave benefit act 2016 (section 31) (commencement) order 2022

title: the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 (No. 11 of 2016) (except insofar as it
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 31 of
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which section 31 of 
the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 (No. 11 of 2016) (except insofar as it 
already is in operation) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 June, 2022. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [361] 3

title: the Paternity Leave and Benefit Act 2016 (No. 11 of 2016) (except insofar as it
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the commencement of section 31 of the Paternity 
Leave and Benefit Act 2016 insofar as it relates to the insertion of paragraph 
(b)(ii)(III) of the definition of “relevant parent” in section 61A(1) of the Social 
Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 (No. 26 of 2005).
